Site_description: Toe drain site at right-most outflow below Beaverdam Reservoir (when facing dam)
Toe drain site at middle outflow below Beaverdam Reservoir (when facing dam)
Toe drain site at left-most outflow below Beaverdam Reservoir (when facing dam)
Pool site at bottom of left-most outflow toe drain below Beaverdam Reservoir

Pelagic upstream site on western arm in central part of depth transect of Beaverdam Reservoir approximately 1/3 of the distance between the western reservoir inflow and the confluence of the two reservoir arms closest to the inflow (when reservoir is at full pond)

Pelagic upstream site on eastern arm in central part of depth transect at Beaverdam Reservoir; approximately halfway point between eastern reservoir inflow and confluence of two reservoir arms (when reservoir is at full pond)
Pelagic upstream site in Beaverdam Reservoir at the location of the upstream pipe outflow leading to Falling Creek Reservoir
Pelagic upstream site in central part of depth transect of Beaverdam Reservoir approximately halfway from reservoir arm confluence and the dam
Pelagic deep hole site nearest to dam; at BVR platform closest to dam
Inflow stream site to BVR on western reservoir arm
Inflow stream site to BVR on eastern reservoir arm that drains upstream impoundment
Pelagic deep hole site of Carvins Cove Reservoir near dam (also site 6 for Ironman sampling); the closest access point to the dam via boat and 21 m at full pond
Pelagic site directly at the dam sampled from dam walkway (site of sensors); can be sampled to 19m at full pond
Inflow stream site to Carvins Cove Reservoir at Horse Pen Branch
Inflow stream site to Carvins Cove Reservoir at Sawmill Branch inflow site upstream of reservoir where fire road bridge crosses the stream
Outflow stream site at Falling Creek Reservoir spillway
Toe drain site at bottom of Falling Creek Reservoir dam
Pelagic upstream site at central depth transect of Falling Creek Reservoir; adjacent to where Tunnel Branch inflow enters into the reservoir
Pelagic upstream site at central depth transect of Falling Creek Reservoir; approximately halfway between dam and Falling Creek inflow
Pelagic upstream site at central depth transect of Falling Creek Reservoir; where reservoir flow enters into the deep hole basin of the reservoir
Pelagic deep hole site nearest to Falling Creek Reservoir dam; at end of FCR catwalk
Inflow stream site on Tunnel Branch primary inflow to Falling Creek Reservoir just above where the stream enters into the reservoir
Inflow stream site on Tunnel Branch primary inflow to Falling Creek Reservoir; long-term monitoring site where gauged weir is located
Inflow stream site on Tunnel Branch primary inflow to Falling Creek Reservoir; upstream of weir and downstream of confluence of BVR inflow pipe and overland flow stream
Inflow stream site on Tunnel Branch primary inflow to Falling Creek Reservoir; upstream of weir and just below where the BVR pipe emerges
Inflow stream site on Falling Creek secondary inflow to Falling Creek Reservoir; also referred to as the wetland stream
Inflow stream site on Falling Creek secondary inflow to Falling Creek Reservoir; the intersection of the inflow into the reservoir
Inflow stream site on Falling Creek secondary inflow to Falling Creek Reservoir; the midway point between the wetland site (FCR 200) and the intersection site (FCR 199.8)
Littoral site directly west of site 10 at FCR. Macrophyte populated site; Juncus effusus dominant
Littoral site southwest of site 10 at FCR. Macrophyte populated site; Sparganium americanum dominant
Littoral site northwest of site 20 at FCR. Macrophyte populated site; Scirpus cyperinus dominant
Littoral site directly east of site 20 at FCR. Macrophyte populated site; Potamogeton pusillus dominant
Littoral site northwest of site 30 at FCR. No macrophytes present
Littoral site southeast of site 30 at FCR. No macrophytes present
Littoral site directly west of site 45 at FCR. Macrophyte populated site; Typha latifolia dominant
